Class PurchaseTab

  • java.lang.Object
    • ee.ut.math.tvt.bartersmart.ui.tabs.PurchaseTab

  • public class PurchaseTab
extends java.lang.Object
    Encapsulates everything that has to do with the purchase tab (the tab labelled "Point-of-sale" in the menu).
